sentences.english: The nostalgia complex of Chinese modern prose is the researched goal of this paper.
sentences.chinese: 本文对中国现代散文的怀乡情结进行了系统研究。

sentences.english: Tokyo time back garden writing, the stress expresses "is homesick" the complex.
sentences.chinese: 东京时期的后花园书写，侧重表达“怀乡”情结。

sentences.english: He has left home for years. We can imagine how much he misses his hometown.
sentences.chinese: 他离家多年，怀乡的心情是可想而知的。
